Uses of Class
chess.directions

  • Uses of directions in chess

    Methods in chess that return directions 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static directions[] Chess.getLegalMoves​(int startX, int startY)
    Finds and returns all legal moves of Piece at specified coordinates.
    directions[] Bishop.getMoves()
    Returns Bishop specific moves for directional evaluation
    directions[] King.getMoves()
    Returns King specific moves for directional evaluation
    directions[] Knight.getMoves()
    Returns Knight specific moves for directional evaluation
    directions[] Pawn.getMoves()
    Returns Pawn specific moves for directional evaluation.
    abstract directions[] Piece.getMoves()
    Abstract method to be implemented by subclasses to define Piece-specific directionality
    directions[] Queen.getMoves()
    Returns Queen specific moves for directional evaluation
    directions[] Rook.getMoves()
    Returns Rook specific moves for directional evaluation
    directions Piece.getPosition()
